messages.subject: CNN - Private college presidents' salaries rise rapidly, survey shows
messages.msgSnippet: Hmmmm, interesting report.  I wonder if the quality of learning for the students is rising just as fast?  With such highly paid managerial talent at the
messages.messageBody:
Hmmmm, interesting report. I wonder if the quality of learning for the
students is rising just as fast? With such highly paid managerial "talent"
at the helm, it has got to have a trickle down effect to the students,
doesn't it????

>>But the Chronicle report said critics worry that by behaving more like
businesses, colleges might be losing the idea that they are non-profit
institutions with an intent to serve.<<

I say lets cut through the rhetoric. Higher education has become an
industry just like any other. Let's just admit this to ourselves and get on
with things.

John

http://www.cnn.com/US/9911/22/college.presidents/index.html
